lead: According to Ivan Tertel, the "sponsors" of those involved in carrying out sabotage give these people no opportunity to bow out of such activity

title: Russian army has enough ammo and Kiev’s losses mounting, says defense chief
lead: In April, Kiev lost over 15,000 troops and 430 armored vehicles in battles

title: Incidents during evacuation from Sudan avoided thanks to effort by Russian agencies
lead: It is noted that the incidents plagued almost all Western evacuation missions

title: Bad weather not allowing Kiev to launch counteroffensive — Ukrainian envoy
lead: Earlier, it was reported that Ukrainian troops planned to launch their counteroffensive in the southern direction next month

title: Kiev’s hopes for fast-track NATO entry may prove elusive — Deutsche Presse-Agentur
lead: NATO Secretary General Jens Stoltenberg visited Kiev in April, where he emphasized, at a meeting with Ukrainian President Vladimir Zelensky, that the doors to NATO remained open for Ukraine

title: Lukashenko points to increasingly frequent cases of saboteurs’ penetration into Belarus
lead: It is reported that the situation around Belarus remains tense, NATO is building up its military potential near the Belarusian borders and provocations are carried out at the border

title: Russian forces hit Ukrainian army sites — battlegroup spokesman
lead: According to Vadim Astafiev, in the Avdeyevka area, as a result of counter-battery fighting, the firing positions of Ukrainian missile and artillery troops were destroyed

title: Russian forces hit railway station in Kramatorsk — battlegroup spokesman
lead: "Tornado-S multiple rocket launchers destroyed a carload of ammunition," Vadim Astafiev said

title: Russian top brass says Ukrainian 127th brigade’s ammo depot eliminated near Kharkov
lead: The spokesman for the Russian Defense Ministry Igor Konashenkov reported

title: Russian forces wipe out Ukrainian troops near Ugledar, top brass says
lead: According to Defense Ministry Spokesman Igor Konashenkov, the enemy’s losses estimated at up to 55 troops

title: Russian forces neutralize 5 Ukrainian subversive groups in Kharkov region, LPR — top brass
lead: Also in the Kharkov Region, "more than 85 Ukrainian troops, two cars and a D-20 howitzer were eliminated in the past day"

title: Russian forces strike Ukrainian troops near Kalinovka, Chasov Yar in DPR — top brass
lead: The group’s artillery performed 64 fire missions

title: Russian forces delivered massive strike on Ukrainian defense plants last night — top brass
lead: They disrupted the work of plants that manufacture ammunition and hardware for Ukrainian troops, Russian Defense Ministry Spokesman Igor Konashenkov reported

title: Russian air defenses destroy eight Ukrainian drones over past day — top brass
lead: Defense Ministry Spokesman Lieutenant-General Igor Konashenkov reported

title: Observation post of Ukraine’s 72nd brigade attacked by Russian forces near Ugledar
lead: According to the spokesman for Russia’s top brass Igor Konashenkov, perational/tactical and army aviation, missile troops and artillery of the Russian Armed Forces inflicted damage on 87 Ukrainian artillery units at firing positions, manpower and hardware in 109 areas

title: Ukraine’s losses in Krasny Liman area reach up to 55 troops, 3 howitzers — top brass
lead: The enemy’s losses over the past day in this area totaled an armored combat vehicle, one pickup truck

title: Russia eliminates up to 15 Ukrainian troops, artillery gun in Kherson area — top brass
lead: In the Kherson direction two cars, a Msta-B howitzer were destroyed in the strike, Russian Defense Ministry Spokesman Lieutenant-General Igor Konashenkov reported

title: Russian forces wipe out more than 300 Ukrainian troops near Donetsk in past day
lead: Also an ammo depot of Ukraine’s 53rd mechanized brigade was wiped out near Novoukrainka
